title: I always meet the strong enemy on the normal game
body: IN LAST 3 months i always meet the Diamond and Platinum emeny on the normal. My rank is only silver 2(S5 was gold 5). When i play normal my teammate r always gold and silver,last week i even see the challenge No. 10 on the game , i played with 2 gold and 1platinum. Emeny team was 1 challenge, 2 marster 1 and 2 diamond. I want to know why i will always play the unfair game. I  need a solution to deal this phenomenon. PLS help me ,i want to have a fair game which with out bully. if i have strong emeny, pls give me strong team. At least, i can have funny game without bully. Who can tell my, where can i ask the RIOT staff, i want them fix this problem for me .

replies.body:
This happened to me last season when I got close to Silver 1

There's really no good solution. Not because **Riot**'s systems are bad, but because at those higher MMRs (close to Gold 5+) most players play exclusively ranked. Which means the normal queue at those MMRs has really low populations.

You don't seem to be getting stomped in your recent [match history](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=hzx86s), but if you really think that you're severely out-classed and loosing lots, then the system should slowly adjust and match you with worse players over time.

My normal queue fully adjusted in about 20 games after I stopped playing ranked, you could expect yours to be about the same. I totally feel your pain though :'(

Yea , i  understood. But this happen to me april, i played rank on last week. Maybe i should ask RIOT's staff .Now i can not practice champ on normal, because i don't want to play this unfair game. Thank you for your help.  WHERE CAN I FIND THE RIOT'S STAFF? OvO?

I think it has something to do with how Ranked MMR and Normal MMR correlate. It only fixed itself for me once I stopped playing ranked.

The best way to talk to a **Rioter** is to send in a [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) ticket directly to **Riot**.
